summary: This document contains requests and certifications related to motor vehicle records from the Florida Department of Highway Safety and Motor Vehicles. It includes details about a vehicle owned by Christopher Paul Pierce and Darlene M. Pierce, including lien information and vehicle registration details. The document is part of a larger investigation and is subject to a protective order.

persons.name: Jeanette Maiwald
persons.context: Jeanette Maiwald is mentioned as the DMV representative to whom the Palm Beach Police Department is sending a request for vehicle records.

persons.name: Carl A. Ford
persons.context: Carl A. Ford is identified as the custodian of motor vehicle records who certifies the accuracy of the vehicle records provided.

persons.name: Christopher Paul Pierce
persons.context: Christopher Paul Pierce is listed as the owner of a 2004 Dodge Ram 1500 vehicle, involved in the lien and registration details.

persons.name: Darlene M. Pierce
persons.context: Darlene M. Pierce is mentioned as the co-owner of the 2004 Dodge Ram 1500 vehicle along with Christopher Paul Pierce.

connections.description: Christopher Paul Pierce and Darlene M. Pierce are listed as co-owners of the same vehicle.

events.title: Vehicle Purchase
events.description: Christopher Paul Pierce and Darlene M. Pierce purchased a 2004 Dodge Ram 1500.

events.title: Lien Recorded
events.description: A lien was recorded against the vehicle owned by Christopher Paul Pierce and Darlene M. Pierce.

keyFacts: The document includes a request for certified copies of motor vehicle records related to a vehicle owned by Christopher Paul Pierce and Darlene M. Pierce.
A lien was recorded against the vehicle on March 11, 2005.
The vehicle in question is a 2004 Dodge Ram 1500 with VIN 1D7HA16D64J291609.
The document is part of a larger investigation and is subject to a protective order.
